translations: n．占领者：占据、控制或居住在某地的人或团体。
· The occupiers of the building were forced to leave.
大楼的占用者被迫离开。

sentences.sentence: When the invasion occurred he seized power and ruled the country as a puppet of the occupiers.
sentences.translation: 他趁入侵之时夺取了政权，作为占领者的傀儡统治着这个国家。

sentences.sentence: Some said German occupiers were pillaging Belgium.
sentences.translation: 有人说德军正在掠夺比利时。

sentences.sentence: New apartment blocks and office buildings appear with few new occupiers to pay for them.
sentences.translation: 新开发的公寓楼和办公楼没有几家入驻。
